The original photo is 18 cm long and 12 cm wide. (I) Write an algebraic equation depicting the above information. (II) Write the corresponding quadratic equation in standard form. (III) What should be the new dimensions of the enlarged photo? OR Can any rational value of x make the new area equal to 220 cm²?
